rows.label: qst201916_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks to that black-haired Nopon,
my lovely shell hairpiece is all broken!

rows.label: qst201916_msg0002
rows.name:
I loved that hairpiece... It was a
birthday present and everything...

rows.label: qst201916_msg0003
rows.name:
My daddy said he got it from
a salvager friend.

rows.label: qst201916_msg0004
rows.name:
He said it was so pretty,
he was sure it would suit me!
